alert.note: Alert for Madison River Valley; Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 2:13PM MST until February 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Madison River Valley and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Madison River Valley; Northwest Beaverhead County
